Header: Gas station robbed in Kaduwela at gun point
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A petrol station in Kothalawala, Kaduwela was robbed by two masked men on a motorbike last night(April 02). The suspects had threatened the employees with a firearm and had also fired a few shots into the air. Police stated the robbers had stolen Rs.30,000 in cash from the station. Police investigations are underway.
